Key Match Events: Australia was skittled for 111 with Santner taking 3-31
Devon Conway scored 92 off 58 for New Zealand
Jimmy Neesham added late impetus with 26 off 13
Post-Match Reflections: Andrew Moore: 'The story out of this is the brilliant performance from New Zealand'
Stuart Clark: 'The Australians have been outplayed in bat and ball by New Zealand in their opening game'
Miscellaneous Highlights: England face Afghanistan in the day's later game from 12:00 BST
Others: The match is being played in Perth, Australia
